statements: SELECT * FROM fleet_management;
SELECT vehicle_name, location FROM fleet_management WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name FROM fleet_management ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM fleet_management WHERE location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(1 1)');
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, status FROM fleet_management WHERE status IN ('active', 'offline') ORDER BY vehicle_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM fleet_management WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_name, ST_X(location) AS latitude, ST_Y(location) AS longitude FROM fleet_management WHERE status = 'inactive';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, status FROM fleet_management WHERE location IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_vehicles, MAX(vehicle_id) AS max_vehicle_id FROM fleet_management WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT DISTINCT status FROM fleet_management ORDER BY status ASC;
SELECT * FROM fleet_locations;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM fleet_locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM fleet_locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT location_id, timestamp FROM fleet_locations WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT vehicle_id, status FROM vehicle_status WHERE status='Active';
SELECT * FROM fleet_locations WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -80 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM fleet_locations WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT vehicle_id, status, last_update FROM vehicle_status WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM fleet_locations WHERE location_id IN (1, 5, 7);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_locations, MAX(latitude) AS max_latitude, MIN(longitude) AS min_longitude FROM fleet_locations;
SELECT * FROM FleetLocation WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -100.0;
SELECT vehicle_id, status FROM VehicleStatus WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM RouteHistory WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_time DESC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM FleetLocation WHERE vehicle_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT route_details, start_time, end_time FROM RouteHistory WHERE route_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM FleetLocation WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100 ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude FROM FleetLocation WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30 AND 35 AND longitude BETWEEN -90 AND -80;
SELECT v.vehicle_id, v.status, r.route_details FROM VehicleStatus v INNER JOIN RouteHistory r ON v.vehicle_id = r.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM FleetLocation JOIN RouteHistory ON FleetLocation.vehicle_id = RouteHistory.vehicle_id;
SELECT vehicle_id, status FROM VehicleStatus WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_type, manufacturer, model FROM vehicles WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota';
SELECT vehicle_id, last_known_location FROM vehicles ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE distance_km > 100;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_type, manufacturer FROM vehicles ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance_km > 100 ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, last_known_location FROM vehicles WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota' OR manufacturer = 'Honda';
SELECT drivers.first_name, drivers.last_name, vehicles.vehicle_type FROM drivers JOIN vehicles ON drivers.supervisor_id = vehicles.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM fleet_locations;
SELECT vehicle_id, location FROM fleet_locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM vehicle_info WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM driver_info WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT vehicle_id, start_location, end_location FROM route_logs ORDER BY start_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_info WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota';
SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer, model FROM vehicle_info ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, model, year FROM vehicle_info WHERE year > 2015 AND manufacturer <> 'Ford';
SELECT * FROM fleet_locations INNER JOIN vehicle_info ON fleet_locations.vehicle_id = vehicle_info.vehicle_id;
SELECT DISTINCT driver_id, first_name, last_name, license_number FROM driver_info;
